movie.title: Bully. Coward. Victim. The Story of Roy Cohn
movie.title_english: Bully. Coward. Victim. The Story of Roy Cohn
movie.title_long: Bully. Coward. Victim. The Story of Roy Cohn (2019)
movie.description_intro: A look at the life and work of New York power broker Roy Cohn.
movie.description_full: A look at the life and work of New York power broker Roy Cohn.

movies.title: Mars: One Day on the Red Planet
movies.title_english: Mars: One Day on the Red Planet
movies.title_long: Mars: One Day on the Red Planet (2020)
movies.summary: An epic journey revealing the real Mars, as you've never seen it before. Using data from orbiters and rovers to build accurate views of the red planet and uncover its secrets. On a single circuit of Mars from dawn to dusk, encounter monster volcanoes, ancient lakes, alien ice-worlds and spacecraft crash sites. Explore humanity's Martian obsession, join the relentless search for life there, and hunt for a human home on the red planet's surface.
movies.description_full: An epic journey revealing the real Mars, as you've never seen it before. Explore humanity's Martian obsession, join the relentless search for life there, and hunt for a human home on the red planet's surface.

movies.title: Won't You Be My Neighbor?
movies.summary: Charmingly soft-spoken and yet powerfully incisive expressing his profound ideals, Fred Rogers was a unique presence on television for generations. Through interviews of his family and colleagues, the life of this would-be pastor is explored as a man who found a more important calling to provide an oasis for children in a video sea of violent bombardment. That proved to be his landmark series, Mister Rogers' Neighborhood (1968), a show that could gently delve into important subjects no other children's show would have dared for that time. In doing so, Rogers experienced a career where his sweet-tempered idealism charmed and influenced the world whether it be scores of children on TV or recalcitrant authorities in government. However, that beloved personality also hid Rogers' deep self-doubts about himself and occasional misjudgments even as he proved a rock of understanding in times of tragedy for a world that did not always comprehend a man of such noble character.

movies.title: Pope Francis: A Man of His Word
movies.title_english: Pope Francis: A Man of His Word
movies.title_long: Pope Francis: A Man of His Word (2018)
movies.summary: "Pope Francis - A Man of His Word" is intended to be a personal journey with Pope Francis, rather than a biographical documentary about him. The pope's ideas and his message are central to this documentary, which sets out to present his work of reform and his answers to today's global questions.

movies.title: Barolo Boys. The Story of a Revolution
movies.title_english: Barolo Boys. The Story of a Revolution
movies.title_long: Barolo Boys. The Story of a Revolution (2014)
movies.summary: For the first time on the big screen, the film tells the fascinating story of one on the world's most famous wines and how it exploded as a world phenomenon.
movies.description_full: For the first time on the big screen, the film tells the fascinating story of one on the world's most famous wines and how it exploded as a world phenomenon.
